TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DeliveryStatus extends System.Enum

remarks.para: A message sent to a queue can land in a dead-letter queue because the message was not delivered or the Queue Manager is not sure of the delivery outcome. The DeliveryStatus is a way to get the status of message delivery when the message is read from a dead-letter queue.

summary.para: An enumeration that specifies the delivery status of a message when the delivery of the message is in doubt, or when the message was not delivered.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Channels.DeliveryStatus InDoubt = int32(0)

summary.para: The delivery of the message is in doubt.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Channels.DeliveryStatus NotDelivered = int32(1)
